attributes.action: Put a STOP to any more action against our BREXIT.
attributes.background: We the British people voted to leave the EU and our choice to leave the EU should be respected. We are a Democracy and our majority vote to leave the EU should be respected.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
